DOC.detailed_description: Around 75 % vitro fertilization ( IVF ) treatment fail provide healthy baby home . Most woman undergo technique suffer extent anxiety , depression stress . Stress make IVF result bad prove correlate cortisol , adrenaline noradrenaline level fail cycle . Acupuncture prove ability reduce stress level . Moreover , Acupuncture prove effect inhibitory sympathetic system capacity improve vascularization uterus ovary . Available literature concern two issue conclusive study design . AcupunctureÂ´s biological mechanism control ovarian stimulation embryo transfer completely describe ; really one . Published study show different design inconclusive/contradictory result withdraw make difficult take clinical decision recommend acupuncture vitro fertilization ( IVF ) patient . If acupuncture really enhance pregnancy rate IVF cycle still unanswered give randomized three arm study compare intervention sham acupuncture acupuncture publish .
DOC.criteria: 18 37 year old 1828 Body mass index ( BMI ) Medical indication intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) treatment treat sterility No previous vitro fertilization ( IVF ) intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) treatments No previous experience acupuncture treatment At least one high quality embryo day uterine transfer Polycystic ovarian syndrome Endometriosis Reproductive surgery : uterus , fallopian tube ovary Ovarian cyst > 20mm begin stimulation cycle Hormone treatment previous three month stimulation cycle , include oral contraceptive Previous miscarriage ectopic pregnancy Coasting Oestradiol level > 3500pg/ml ovarian size > 65mm human chorio gonadotropin ( hCG ) day . Failure keep confidentiality Concomitant illness severe adverse reaction
